bibl.title: Nuevamente sobre el papiro de los dias de la Odisea.
bibl.note: A new critical study of P. Schubart 3 = P. Berol. Inv. 9571 recto (= Pack2 1225) with a discussion on the conjectures put forward by Merkelbach in a recent paper.
bibl.seg: Galiano Manuel Fernández, Nuevamente sobre el papiro de los dias de la Odisea.
A new critical study of P. Schubart 3 = P. Berol. Inv. 9571 recto (= Pack2 1225) with a discussion on the conjectures put forward by Merkelbach in a recent paper.
